item.description: Turns out, red light isn’t just for your face. HigherDose’s Red Light Hat has given me the best hair and scalp I’ve had in years.

item.title: We Found Two Theaters With Sold-Out ‘Melania’ Opening Day Screenings
item.description: A WIRED analysis of nearly 1,400 Friday showtimes of Melania found only two with no tickets available. Both are before 3 pm.
